summary: The “Jobs and Opportunity with Benefits and Services (JOBS) for Success Act of 2025” reauthorizes and reforms the Temporary Assistance for Needy Families (TANF) program. Key provisions include: revising eligibility criteria, establishing individual opportunity plans and  work requirements, promoting accountability through work outcome measures and reports, targeting funds to truly needy families and core purposes, strengthening program integrity, and promoting data reporting and coordination. The bill also eliminates obsolete provisions and supplemental grants.
